title: Club Penguin Comics: Volume 1
description: This reader-sized book is a compilation of silly comics about everything Club Penguin, from puffles to igloos to friendship, and more. This collection features the best comics from the virtual world of Club Penguin - plus lots of original, brand new comics. It's perfect for reluctant readers, and for Club Penguin fans everywhere.
author: Grosset & Dunlap
